name: a
description: Defines a hyperlink.

name: abbr
description: Defines an abbreviation or an acronym.

name: article
description: Specifies an article or self-contained content.

name: aside
description: Specifies content aside from the page content.

name: b
description: Defines bold text without any extra importance.

name: blockquote
description: Defines a section that is quoted from another source.

name: body
description: Defines the document's body.

name: br
description: Inserts a single line break.

name: button
description: Defines a clickable button.

name: code
description: Defines a piece of computer code.

name: details
description: Specifies additional details that the user can open and close.

name: div
description: Defines a division or a section in an HTML document.

name: h1 to h6
description: Defines HTML headings.

name: head
description: Defines information about the document.

name: hr
description: Defines a thematic change in the content.

name: html
description: Defines the root of an HTML document.

name: img
description: Defines an image.

name: li
description: Defines a list item.

name: link
description: Links to an external resource, like a stylesheet.

name: main
description: Specifies the main content of a document.

name: meta
description: Defines metadata about an HTML document.

name: nav
description: Defines navigation links.

name: ol
description: Defines an ordered list.

name: p
description: Defines a paragraph.

name: span
description: An inline container for phrasing content.

name: table
description: Defines an HTML table.

name: td
description: Defines a standard cell in an HTML table.

name: tr
description: Defines a row in an HTML table.

name: ul
description: Defines an unordered list.
